title: Determine the Principal Quantum Number
text: The principal quantum number N tells us the energy level. Here, $$N=3$$, which indicates that the orbital is on the third energy level.

title: Match the Angular Momentum Quantum Number to the Corresponding Orbital.
text: Match the angular momentum quantum number to the corresponding orbital. For reference, l $$=$$ 0: s orbital, $$l=1$$: $$p$$ orbital, $$l=2$$: $$d$$ orbital, $$l=3$$: f orbital, etc.

title: Calculate the Number of Angular Nodes
text: Calculate the number of angular nodes: angular nodes $$=$$ l.

title: Calculate the Number of Angular Nodes
Calculate the Number of Radial Nodes
text: Calculate the number of radial nodes: radial nodes $$=$$ $$n$$ - l - $$1$$.
